name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 401 Dismantling the Duck Fence for Firewood
description:
This proof documents the dismantling of the wooden fence that once enclosed the duck coop at MaMeeFarm™ on
28 December 2025, 08:11 (local time).

With no ducks remaining, the fence no longer serves its original purpose.
The wooden poles are repurposed as firewood for cooking, sustaining both humans and dogs living on the farm.

This moment reflects adaptive survival under constraint:
when livestock is gone, materials are reclaimed, and nothing is wasted.

Under DGCP principles, this is not loss—but resource transformation, recorded as lived reality without narrative embellishment.
